name: OSDev
tagline: OSDev where fingers on codes with your backs on concrete were tested ;)
body:
This about operating systems labâ€™s details that we have covered in our lab course and discusses various topics about it. In its initial stages it might not look as good but in near future the repository will be updated accordingly it will be updated accordingly.

The major task we did in our Lab was [OSDev](https://www.facebook.com/oslab2015?ref=ts&fref=ts) which led us to the basic understanding of the Operating Systems and system programming as we developed the basic modules od a kernel and then merged them all in System Calls as well

However I would like to mention my group members with me who were keenly and very helpful throgugh out the course. Below is the list including me with facebook profiles linked

* [Ali Azam Rana](https://www.facebook.com/ali.rana007)
* [Uzair Fiaz](https://www.facebook.com/uzair.fiaz)
* [Huzaifa Ahmed](https://www.facebook.com/Ch.Huzaifa)
* [Abdullah Amjad](https://www.facebook.com/rockyy.prince)

Last but not least we would like to thank out Lab Instructor [Sir Mujtaba Aslam](https://www.facebook.com/stlove26?ref=ts&fref=ts) who was helpful in all means of providing us the environment to groom in the field we all loved and bearing us in troublesome times
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
